item.description:
Sel de la Terre (http://seldelaterre.c...) is a change-up from our usual North End Italian meals. It is very French, as those who attended our wine tasting there in November already know. we will be there on the first day of Restaurant Week. The 3-course brunch should be $20. (+7% tax, 18% tip & drinks) But you may also order off their regular brunch menu if 3 courses is too much for you. If you get there from 12:00-1:00, we'll be mingling in the bar area. The restaurant is located across from the Long Wharf Marriott Hotel and the Aquarium T-stop. Daylight Savings Time begins that day. So let's all celebrate with a good meal.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the bar until 1:00.
item.name: Sel de la Terre-Restaurant Week Brunch
